phrases: To Mr. Junichi Katsuragi
I empathize with you.
You were right about the way things are, but we should stand up for ourselves.
And so, I have decided to form a publishing company together with a few of our comrades joining forces.
I would like you to see it as the same battle but in a new form, and hope you will join me in this endeavor.
I want to talk to you about this face to face.
- Arita
- Arita
What should I do?
I forget what I was like before I met you
The wind caresses my cheek
JLullaby of BirdlandJ
Kick my heels going down the slope
As my worthless shadow grows
It is like an endless summer vacation
Feels like sneakin' into the swimming pool
Hey, let us swim with our clothes on, jump in!!
A shocking seductive spiral
This beat that pierces my heart is strange
(It flares up, then vanishes)
Every miserable day is swell,
dress it up
A high-speed swing surrounds us
(What is this dance called?
I cannot stop)
Do not you go, it is twined around my ears
and will not leave me ever again
This melody...
A Christmas party?!
And we can go, too?!
Of course.
It is next Sunday.
We will be there!
Since it is an Olympus party, will you play guitar for us?
Well, if you have got a request...
Ri-chan, are you coming to the Christmas party, too?
You can go with Nishimi-san, right?
I am not really part of that group, so I will pass.
Sorry, I cannot make it.
There is a Christmas party at the church on Sunday.
Then Kawabuchi-kun is going to that, too?
Yeah.
We should have checked before...
Maruo-kun.
If you do not mind, I think I would like to go to the party after all.
Really?!
I never thought you would agree to come, Nishimi-kun.
Like this, little by little, it is best to put some distance between us.
I am sure of it...
Hey!
You are late, Richie-baby!
H-Hi...
Alright!
Next we will play the Spiders.
What about the Beatles?!
Let us go with Bang Bang Bang!
Nishimi-san, how about some cider?
Sure.
Feigning innocence, bang bang bang!
Bang bang, bababababababa-bang!
He is someone I cannot beat!
Bang bang, bababababababa-bang!
Come on, Nishimi-san, let us sing together!
I do not really know the popular songs...
I wonder what he is doing right now...
Maybe he is talking to Ri-chan at the church?
I go to a party and all I do is think about those two...
I feel like a fool...
Kaoru-san?
Ri-chan...
Why are you here?
I thought you were going to church...
Yeah.
The church's Christmas party is over.
He is not here with you?
Does he have to be?
Um...
He went home with the little ones.
I see...
It is cold, is not it?
Yeah.
Hey, come on!
I got you, baby!
Come to think of it, it is almost his birthday, is not it?
I hope you finish in time.
Why...?
Why do you say things like that?
You are wrong!
This is for...
Never mind!
Kaoru-san, you are an idiot!
What did I do this time?
I do not know.
It is hard to understand women.
Why did I lose my temper like that?
I am the one who rejected Kaoru-san in the first place.
Even if I finished knitting this, there is no way I would be able to give it to him.
I am relieved.
You are safe for now Yurika, but let me tell you something...
I know.
You are going to tell me not to see him, right?
You do not have to keep repeating yourself.
Chet... no!
Chet!
Sentaro...
What are you doing here?
What am I...? I have been waitin' for you.
W-Why are you acting so formal?
Ri'ko...
I am sorry.
I never realized how you felt'til now.
I may have said dumb things an' hurt you...
I am sorry.
But... um... how can I put it...?
But about your feelings, I, uh...
Sentaro, why are you suddenly on your best behavior?
Stop it already.
This is not a yakuza movie.
Did I get it wrong?
Yeah.
You got it wrong.
O-Oh, a misunderstanding.
Sorry for talkin' so weird...
R-Right!
We are like family.
You made me nervous for a second there...
I-In that case, good.
We are like family, so I could not stand the thought of causin' you pain.
I am glad I heard this now, and not a while back.
What is that supposed to mean?
I am never going to tell a blockhead like you.
There is something I have to tell you.
I am going back to Tokyo soon.
I probably will not see you again...
An upperclassman from my college is starting up his own publishing company
and he wants me to help him.
I plan on leaving soon after New Year's.
It is taken me a long time to get to this point,
but I owe it to you for making me think I should give going back one more try.
I am grateful.
Idiot.
I do not want to hear those words.
Just do not leave me...
But I cannot bring myself to say that.
Not when he is finally trying to move forward.
Ritsuko-chan!
Yurika-san!
W-What are you doing?
Looking for something.
I carelessly threw something away that was important to me.
Hey, is that girl homeless?
Say, Ritsuko-chan...
Never mind me.
Please, go on ahead.
A beautiful girl like you should not be seen doing something like this, Yurika-san.
Ritsuko-chan...
I will help you.
P-Please, do not!
It is something important, is not it?
Yurika-san...
So... what am I looking for?
Here it is!
This is it, right?
Yes!
But I will have to start over with clean yarn...
Is this going to be a present for someone?
Um...
Why did you throw away something so important?
I was confused.
I suddenly felt stupid for knitting a gift that I would never be able to give.
Why would not you be able to?
B-Because a lot of things have happened between us...
You turned him down, did not you?
And I could not tell him I like him now, after all that,
so I decided to let it go.
But then I thought that would not do.
See, there was another time when I said nothing and just gave up.
Do you regret it?
No.
I would given up on that long ago.
Besides, I have realized this person has been there
to support me all this time, whenever I have felt down.
I had no confidence in myself, but he did his best to encourage me.
This time, I want to be the one to tell him how I feel.
I finally decided to stop keeping my mouth shut and waiting for things to end.
I am sorry for talking about this...
No, I am glad you did.
I think you have opened my eyes as well.
So...
By the way, who is it?
Who is your prince, Ritsuko-chan?
Oh, that is...
Shall I try and guess?
W-W-What are you saying?!
Please, stop!
You are so cute!
Yes.
I am set to leave this weekend.
Working in Tokyo?
Yeah.
A lot happened at college and I ended up dropping out.
But you will come back once in a while, will not you?
Like you have been doing?
No.
I am never coming back to this town.
Kaoru-kun, our sessions were fun.
I will miss seeing you and Sen-boy,
but I do not want you guys to stop playing jazz.
Brother Jun!
Did you tell him you were going back to Tokyo?!
Hey, Sen!
What is the hubbub, Richie?
It is about Brother Jun!
Yeah, he is about to go back to Tokyo, right?
I heard from Pops.
Well, are not got nothing to do with me.
Hey, want to jam?
You are going to let that be the last you see of him?
There is nothing to say.
You looked up to him as a big brother since you were a kid!
You may never get the chance to meet him again!
There would be no point.
Once he is gone, it will be too late!
Enough about Brother Jun already.
Let us get started here.
If you do not feel like practicin', I am going home.
What is all the fuss about?
I guess college students from Tokyo and all over have come to demonstrate
against letting the nuclear aircraft carrier into port.
That is terrible...
In their eyes, I am a traitor.
They may never forgive me.
But...
Using a different method than them...
Oh, you are here, Richie.
Here, eat.
I made it myself, so it might be a little salty...
But if you are not going to eat it, I will.
Is this any time to be eating?!
Did you forget what I said last time?!
What are you talkin' about?
Do not play dumb!
Are you going to be stubborn'til it is too late?!
Brother Jun is leaving this town today or tomorrow!
It is today.
I am taking the night train, Kaoru-kun.
Sen-boy, this was rather old-fashioned of you.
Letter of Challenge
I thought it was some kind of joke.
It is no joke.
I wanted to try having a serious showdown with you, Brother June
Wait...
You are not really...
I made it in time?
Let me in on it, too.
This is no duet.
They are seriously duking it out.
Sorry for causing you so much trouble, Pops.
Tell me about it!
And when you reach Tokyo,
first thing you do is get to a barber!
Sure, sure.
Well, I am off.
Brother Jun!
I will remember today's session for the rest of my life!
Yeah.
Me too, Sen-boy.
What are you doing here?
I told you not to see me off.
I have four questions I want you to answer.
If you try to dodge me, I will get on this train with you.
So answer me truthfully.
Question number one: Why did you tell me not to see you off?
I hate sad goodbye scenes.
Question number two: Did not you think to take me with you?
The work I am going to be doing is kind of a gamble.
Even if I took you with me, there is no guarantee of making any kind of living.
Besides, you are still in high school.
Question number three...
Why did not you do anything more than kiss me?!
Did you not touch me because you intended to leave from the start?
No.
I knew.
I knew how much you cared about me...
This is my last question...
Will not you take me with you?
I want you to take good care of your own life.
I figured you would say something like that.
Now it feels like I have been set free, too.
I am going back to my own world.
Thank you, Junichi-san.
Goodbye.
Yurika, where are you?!
Come out, Yurika!
How dare you embarrass us by walking out
in the middle of an arranged marriage meeting like that?!
Calm down, dear!
We are going back there together, Yurika!
Yurika, where are you?!
I am going back to my own world.
I dragged you on board...
Now what?
What is there to do?
The train's already left the station.
Yeah...
Well, when we get there, we will go to my room first
and maybe I will have you cut my hair.
It is freezing today.
Yeah.
Think I will light the heater.
I waited for you on that slope
For our after school promise
There was a'goodbye' blurred far away
I was so weak, so awkward, and so fragile back then
But you gave me a small pair of wings
In the twilight hour of the sky,
I am searching for a gleam of light
If only I could have said that I love you
The note that I wrote in the corner of my textbook
has never been delivered to this day
